The Penn State womens hockey team lines up before the game against RIT at the Pegula Ice Arena on Saturday Jan PERIOD   PERIOD Penn State won  PERIOD

It was with determination that Penn State made its resolution to perform better after the new year PERIOD

The statistics have proven that in some areas the Nittany Lions have kept that promise PERIOD

Compared to the first half of the season the Lions   College Hockey America have grown considerably on the ice as a team PERIOD Because the team is only eight games into its second half of the season its only fair that the stats should be compared to the first eight games of the season PERIOD

In the first official game of the season the Lions struggled against the Minnesota Golden Gophers and were shut out both days at  and  at Pegula Ice Arena PERIOD Boston University the first road challenge of the season is where the Lions drew their first series with a  win on Friday and a  loss on Saturday PERIOD

The Lions then returned to University Park for a twogame series against Union winning their first series with a  shutout both days PERIOD The next weekend however the Lions lost their momentum and therefore lost the series to UConn  both with onegoal losses PERIOD

In the first eight games the Lions  with a total of  goals  averaged . goals per game PERIOD The team also with  assists averaged . assists per game PERIOD

The Lions throughout these games went  on the power play a roughly  percent efficiency PERIOD

On the other hand the Lions also had a penalty kill average of . percent PERIOD Together Lions goalies Celine Whitlinger and Hannah Ehresmann combined for  saves on  shots making that a . save percentage PERIOD

Focuses in practice during these weeks and consecutive weeks included the penalty kill and the power play PERIOD Before the winter break the work culminated in playing nearly full games as the team began to experience a series of latethird period losses on their 12game road series PERIOD

Even going into this weekends series against Syracuse the Lions continue to focus on the details PERIOD

Its just the same thing every week senior captain Shannon Yoxheimer said PERIOD Just focus on dzone special teams and really trying to sustain a good work ethic through the whole practice. starting the new year with a split series against Ohio State on Jan PERIOD  the Lions lost the first game  and won the second game  PERIOD The team then finished its road series with another series split against RIT losing Fridays game  and winning  in overtime on Saturday PERIOD

The first four games at home were good to the team PERIOD

It won against Robert Morris  on Friday Jan PERIOD  and then tied the Colonials  in overtime the next night PERIOD

Last weekend the Lions decisively won their first series against the Tigers a team they played two weeks previously PERIOD The Lions shutout the Tigers  Friday night and  Saturday afternoon PERIOD

Though the Lions still totaled  goals throughout these first eight games also an average of . goals per game the number of assists per game has increased by . from . assistspergame to . assistspergame PERIOD

Another area that has improved though only slightly is the goaltending PERIOD

Whitlinger and Ehresmann in the first eight games of the second half combined for a total of  saves on  shots PERIOD This is a percentage of . for an increase of . percent PERIOD

Though their power play goal percentage has gone down from . percent in the first eight games to . percent in the last eight games the Lions have improved their penalty kill percentage with a decrease of . percent  from . to . pERIOD

I feel like penalty kills is something that we emphasize Bella Sutton said PERIOD Special teams is really important like a lot of games come down to that PERIOD Being able to kill off those penalties are huge for us PERIOD Its definitely a good thing and we recognize that its been getting better but were not satisfied and we really hope to continue to increase that. correction A previous version of the above article incorrectly noted the score of one of Penn States losses to Minnesota PERIOD The article now reflects the correct information PERIOD The Daily Collegian apologizes for this error PERIOD
